name: Oafkad's Unreal Learning Project
description:
This will be the hub for following along with my Unreal Engine learning series. I wouldn't expect anything absolutely mind blowing but I'm sure it'll be fun.

If you like what I do, donations are welcomed but not at all expected.

We've upgraded from Third Person Template to the Learning Kit. I've added collectables, a time limit, the ability to restart, and an end screen! Tell me what you best time is!
